entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
